articles.description: Liverpool's 3-3 draw at Newcastle is described as "one of the best games of the season" - and gives their rivals hope in the battle for the Premier League title.
articles.title: Newcastle 3-3 Liverpool: 'Best game of season' - draw gives Reds' Premier League title rivals fresh hope

articles.description: Pep Guardiola says he is "so happy" to have Kevin de Bruyne back after the midfielder played an integral role in Manchester City's win against Nottingham Forest.
articles.title: Kevin de Bruyne: Manchester City boss Pep Guardiola 'so happy' midfielder is back

articles.description: Arsenal comfortably beat Manchester United as Ruben Amorim suffers his first defeat since taking charge of the Red Devils.
articles.title: Arsenal 2-0 Man Utd: Defeat for Ruben Amorim as William Saliba and Jurrien Timber score goals for Gunners

articles.description: Follow live text commentary, score updates and match report from Aberdeen vs Celtic in the Scottish Premiership.
articles.title: Aberdeen 0-1 Celtic: Hatate winner at Aberdeen sends Celtic seven clear - BBC Sport

articles.description: Jadon Sancho scores his first goal for Chelsea as they ruthlessly thump struggling Southampton.
articles.title: Southampton 1-5 Chelsea: Jadon Sancho scores in comfortable win

articles.description: England fall to a six-wicket defeat by South Africa in the opening one-day international after Laura Wolvaardt's unbeaten half-century.
articles.title: South Africa vs England: Laura Wolvaardt steers hosts to opening ODI victory

articles.description: Follow live text commentary, score updates and match stats from Athletic Club vs Real Madrid in the Spanish La Liga
articles.title: Athletic Club vs Real Madrid: Spanish La Liga stats & head-to-head - BBC Sport

articles.description: Great Britain's Tom Pidcock is to leave the Ineos Grendiers team at the end of the season despite having three years left on his five-year contract.
articles.title: Tom Pidcock: Ineos Grenadiers team to split with GB rider

articles.description: Fiorentina midfielder Edoardo Bove is out of intensive care and is progressing in his recovery, the club's general manager says.
articles.title: Edoardo Bove: Fiorentina midfielder out of intensive care as club show support

articles.description: An LPGA policy change means transgender women who have gone through male puberty will not be allowed to compete on leading women's golf tours from next year.
articles.title: Hailey Davidson: LPGA updates policy on transgender women golfers
